root: ^You've moved your investigation on towards the city huh? You're definitely onto something there.
^Most of those city folks are nice enough, but the big CEO's that live in their fancy buildings couldn't care less about a small town like ours...
^It wouldn't surprise me if one of them was behind the bees disappearing.
^The supermarket is kind enough to stock some of our produce alongside some of the bigger farm's stuff, so we can't fault them I guess.
